---
name: Bug Report / 错误报告
about: Create this if you find bugs during use / 使用本模板来创建关于使用中bug的议题
title: "[Bug] "
labels: ["bug"]
assignees: ""
---
## Tips / 提示
Please read [How To Ask Questions The Smart Way](http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html) first before submit issues.  
在提问或提交bug前，请仔细阅读[提问的智慧](https://github.com/ryanhanwu/How-To-Ask-Questions-The-Smart-Way/blob/main/README-zh_CN.md)。  

## Description / 问题描述

Please describe the bug clearly and concisely.  
请清晰简洁地描述该问题。  

## To Reproduce / 复现步骤

Steps to reproduce the behavior:  
复现该问题的步骤：  

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior / 预期行为

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.  
请清晰简洁地描述您预期的行为。  

## Actual Behavior / 实际行为

A clear and concise description of what actually happened.  
请清晰简洁地描述实际发生的行为。  

## Environment / 运行环境

Please complete the following information:  
请补充以下信息：  

- **OS / 操作系统**: [e.g. Windows 10, macOS Monterey, Ubuntu 20.04]  
- **Version / 版本号**: [e.g. 1.0.0]  
- 
## Screenshots / 截图

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.  
如适用，请添加截图以辅助说明问题。  

## Logs / 日志

Please paste the relevant log output here, or attach log file.  
请将相关日志输出粘贴在此处或附加日志文件。
